page.title: 15HOME LIFE - OWERSBY
page.content: We are a family of 6,4children aged 13 to 22,the youngest at boarding school, 2 at university and 1 unemployed. Mother is a housewife,doing voluntary work occasionally,and visits her mother in Market Rasen daily.Father has chosen to retire early.He is pres- ently trying to give up smoking.We have 3 dogs,1 cat,1 horse,1 pony.Our house has 5 bedrooms,2 bathrms,7 acres of land and burglar alarm.We have a flat near Bristol and often go there. 5 of us drive and we have 5 cars.Our varied interests are:cricket,football, squash,tennis,riding,music,photography horology,reading,wine-making,knitting, sewing,archaeology,and of necessity, gardening.Mother has a help with house work twice weekly.Mother cooks and some vegetables are home-grown.We pre- fer healthy eating.As Roman Catholics we attend mass at Holy Rood Church.
